data.title: 30+ Features
data.content:
SteemPlus extension brings over 30 new features to your Steem experience

Available on Steemit and Busy

Many more features on our TODO list!

data.title: SteemPlus Points
data.content:
Use third-party Steem Apps and earn SteemPlus Points (SPP).

SPP grant you a share of @steem-plus daily upvotes

Redeem for premium features

.

data.title: For the community
data.content:
Opensource

Developement funded by upvotes from @utopian-io, @adsactly and the community

Over 3,500 daily users

Emphasis on developing features requested by the community

data.title: Voting value slider
data.content: How much is your upvote/flag worth?

data.title: Delegation
data.content: Delegate your Steem Power in an instant!

data.title: Account value
data.content: Get your real account value based on current Bittrex STEEM and SBD prices.

data.title: Feed+
data.content: Filter and sort your feed to find the content you like!

data.title: Beneficiaries
data.content: Share your rewards by setting other users as beneficiaries. @steemplus-pay will be set as a 5% beneficiary and you will earm SPP.

data.title: Mentions
data.content: See who mentionned you and where.

data.title: Vote Value
data.content: See the SBD value of each received vote.

data.title: Signature
data.content: Your posts and comments signatures are just one click away.

data.title: Resteems indicator
data.content: See how many resteems you ve got and from whom.

data.title: VM and RC popup
data.content: Get your Voting Mana and Resource Credits percentage, and their recharge time.

data.title: Utopian
data.content: Post Utopian contributions directly from Steemit. Earn bigger votes and SPP.

data.title: DTube
data.content: Upload your DTube videos directly from Steemit and earn SPP.

data.title: Steem Monsters packs
data.content: Buy Steem Monsters starter and booster packs directly from your Steemit profile and earn SPP.

data.title: Tokens
data.content: View your tokens directly from your Steemit wallet (currently show SPP only)

data.title: Steem Monsters Market
data.content: Buy cards from Steem Monsters Marmet buy batches and earn SPP.

data.title: Badges
data.content: Plankton or Whale? These cool profile badges will let you know!

data.title: Steem Price
data.content: Get STEEM and SBD price on Bittrex directly from your user dropdown.

data.title: Wallet
data.content: Filter your wallet to find what you re looking for!

data.title: Witness
data.content: Get all the information you'll ever need about witnesses, including incoming and outgoing votes.

data.title: Rewards
data.content: Get pending and claimed rewards information.

data.title: Votes
data.content: See all incoming and outgoing votes.

data.title: Histogram
data.content: View an history of all your posts

data.title: GIF
data.content: Pick and insert GIFs as you go!

data.title: Favorites
data.content: Set your favorites and get a direct link to their latest publications!

data.title: More
data.content: Download and try it out to find all our features ;)

where.description:
SteemPlus is available natively on Chrome and Firefox. It’s also available on Opera via the `Install Chrome Extensions` plugin.
What are you waiting for? You are only minutes away from getting more out of your Steem experience!

data.title: Must have
data.review: SteemPlus is a must have google chrome extension that makes Steeming easier and better.  Know prices, buy Steem Monster cards, know your current mana, set beneficiaries, have an off the shelf footer.  It's a great tool that augments your Steem experience.

data.title: Comfortable
data.review: Using steemit without steemplus is like swimming in a dress. Sure, I can do it if I have no choice, but it's uncomfortable and why would I want to?

data.title: Awesome
data.review: SteemPlus is an awesome collection of features that I could not miss anymore!

data.title: Can't live without it!
data.review: Using steemit.com without the SteemPlus extension is like using an old flip phone vs a smart phone. SteemPlus adds a wealth of features and information that, once you get used to, you won’t be able to live without!

data.description: You need more information, or perhaps want to share your suggestions or get some assistance ?
